snippet.title: SENTRY Combat Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
SENTRY is an action-defense first person shooter where you defend your spaceship against a relentless alien threat. Use traps, turrets and environmental destruction to repel invading hordes and engage the enemy in fast-paced FPS action across a dynamic singleplayer or co-op campaign.

Wishlist on Steam now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1252680/SENTRY/

Discord: https://discord.com/invite/TsHGWHquEH
Twitter: https://twitter.com/FirebladeSoft
Website: https://sentrygame.com/
Developed by Fireblade Software: https://firebladesoftware.com/

SENTRY is a registered trademark of Fireblade Software.

#SENTRY #trailer #indiegame
